price: Bene Thamuudi, abantu ba Luutwi hamwe rero n’abantu bo mu gisagara c’ibiti bitotahaye barungikiwe Shu’ayibu. Iyo migwi rero, ni yo migwi y’abantu biyunze mu bugarariji no mu buhakanyi;
arabic: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

meta.transliteration: wathamūdu waqawmu lūṭin wa-aṣḥābu al'aykati ulāika al-aḥzābu
